description: Easy and fresh mango salsa is made with minimal ingredients in less than 35 minutes.
name: Easy Homemade Mango Salsa
recipeIngredient: 2 fresh corn cobs (grilled and kernels removed from the cob (SEE NOTE)
1 jalapeno pepper (cored, seeded and finely chopped)
Juice from 1 large lime or two small limes (approximately 1/4 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the corn on medium heat until you see grill marks on each side and it’s slightly blackened, approximately 15 minutes. Let cool and then cut the kernels off of the cob. Hold them in the bowl that you’ll make the salsa in so they don’t fly all over the place.
Dice the mango. See instructions in the content. Put in a medium bowl with the corn, onion, jalapeno, cilantro, tomatoes, lime juice, and salt and stir well.
